## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                 | Type                                                                                                                    | Default             |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `badgeText` | `badge-text` | Text to show inside badge   | `string`                                                                                                                | `undefined`         |
| `status`    | `status`     | The status of badge (color) | `TecStatus.danger \| TecStatus.info \| TecStatus.primary \| TecStatus.secondary \| TecStatus.success \| TecStatus.warn` | `TecStatus.primary` |
